mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of Georgia: with its roads & distances
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Plate no. "20." printed in upper right margin. [original]
Appeared as plate 20 in S.A. Mitchell's "A new universal atlas...," Philadelphia: Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co., 1851. [original]
"Entered accrding to act of Congress, in the year 1850, by Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co., in the clerk's office of the District court of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania." [original]
Includes tables of steamboat routes from Savannah to Augusta and from Ssvannah to Charleston. [original]
Explanation: Canals, Rail Roads, State Capital, County towns, Common towns, Leading roads. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads--Georgia--Maps
